entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain changing to periods of rain late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to 7 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to 7 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
